home.title: Beautiful GitHub Stats for Your README
home.subtitle: Minimal, modern, and customizable GitHub statistics cards. Showcase your contributions with style.

preview.empty: Enter a GitHub username to preview
preview.error: Failed to load stats. Check username or try again.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to showcase your GitHub profile

themes.title: Beautiful Themes
themes.desc: Choose from multiple themes or customize colors to match your README aesthetic.

i18n.title: i18n Support
i18n.desc: Display your stats in English or Japanese. More languages coming soon.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.desc: Powered by Cloudflare Workers with intelligent caching for instant loading.

cards.title: Multiple Card Types
cards.desc: Stats card, language breakdown, and repository pins - all in one service.

design.title: Minimal Design
design.desc: Clean, modern SVG cards that look great in any README.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.desc: No tracking, no cookies. Just beautiful stats for your profile.

generator.previewError: Failed to load. Check the username.

stats.title: Stats Card Generator
stats.subtitle: Display your GitHub profile statistics with a beautiful card.
stats.hideHint: Comma-separated: stars, commits, prs, issues, contribs

languages.title: Top Languages Generator
languages.subtitle: Display the programming languages you use most across your repositories.

pin.title: Repository Pin Generator
pin.subtitle: Highlight your best repositories with beautiful pin cards.
